scripts.build-browserify: npm uninstall @types/es6-promise; browserify -d -p [ tsify ] web/static/ts/main.ts > priv/static/js/main.js
scripts.watch-browserify: npm uninstall @types/es6-promise; watchify web/static/ts/main.ts -p [ tsify ] -d -o 'exorcist priv/static/js/main.map.js > priv/static/js/main.js'
scripts.build: npm run mk-priv-dirs; npm run build-browserify & npm run build-css & npm run build-assets & npm run copy-mapbox-gl & npm run copy-font-awesome
scripts.watch: npm run mk-priv-dirs; npm run watch-browserify & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-assets & npm run copy-mapbox-gl & npm run copy-font-awesome
scripts.mk-priv-dirs: rm -rf priv/static && mkdir -p priv/static/node_modules; mkdir -p priv/static/js; mkdir -p priv/static/font-awesome; mkdir -p priv/static/css
scripts.deploy: npm run mk-priv-dirs; npm run build-browserify && npm run build-css && npm run build-assets && npm run copy-mapbox-gl && npm run copy-font-awesome
